import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./HomePage.css';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HomePage(){const[scenarios,setScenarios]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchScenarios();},[]);const fetchScenarios=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/scenarios');setScenarios(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching scenarios:',error);}};const handleStartSimulation=scenarioId=>{// Start simulation logic
